dcterms:creator: A. Christensen
D.C. Atkins
S. Berns
J. Wheeler
D.H. Baucom
L.E. Simpson
dcterms:description: This corpus comprises of dyadic conversations between real couples seeking marital counseling. The dataset consists of audio, video recordings along with their transcriptions. Each speaker is rated by multiple annotators over 33 behaviors. The dataset comprises of approximately 0.83 million words with 10,000 unique entries of which 0.5 million is used for training (0.24m for dev and 88k for test).
dcterms:title: Couples Therapy Corpus (CoupTher)

dcterms:creator: Maija Reblin
Steven K. Sutton
Susan Vadaparampil
Richard E. Heyman
Lee Ellington
dcterms:description: This dataset was gathered as part of an observational study of couples coping with advanced cancer. Advanced cancer patients and their spouse caregivers were recruited from clinics and asked to interact with each other in two structured discussions: neutral discussion and cancer related. Interactions were audio-recorded using small digital recorders worn by each participant. Manually transcribed audio has approximately 230,000 word tokens with a vocabulary size of 8173.
dcterms:title: Cancer Couples Interaction Dataset (Cancer)

dcterms:creator: Mitchell Marcus
Grace Kim
Mary Ann Marcinkiewicz
Robert MacIntyre
Ann Bies
Mark Ferguson
Karen Katz
Britta Schasberger
dcterms:description: Penn Tree Bank mainly comprises of articles from Wall Street Journal and is used for evaluating language modeling tasks. It is not expected to contain substantial expressions of behavior.
dcterms:title: Penn Tree Bank Corpus (PTB)
